name: mildness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not being violent, severe, or extreme: Considering the relative mildness of the side effects she decided to try the treatment.
the quality of not being very cold, or not as cold as usual: Because of the exceptional mildness of the winter, spring came early.
the quality of not being very strong in flavour: The fish has a pleasing mildness.
a gentle and calm quality in a person: The mildness of his manner was deceptive.
More examplesFewer examplesThe mildness of the economic downturn was partly due to this intervention.The fire was not needed given the mildness of the weather.the creamy mildness of a bowl of leek and potato soupHe spoke with mildness and simplicity.
